achievements.name: Capybara
achievements.description: You are focused like capybara. Capybara applauds you.

achievements.name: Milly
achievements.description: Bleh! Too focused! Don't you have any time for silly Milly?

achievements.name: Doge
achievements.description: Wow! Such focus! Much zen! So proud. Much wow!

achievements.name: Floppa
achievements.description: Zdravstvuy, tovarisch! Big focus energy. Keep going!

achievements.name: Unico
achievements.description: Omedetou! You found a rare Japanese cat!

achievements.name: Gusic
achievements.description: Hmm...hmm...I smell someone silly!

achievements.name: Mr. Polite
achievements.description: Yes Sire, how do you do? Very well? That's all very good, Sire.

achievements.name: Pop Cat
achievements.description: Pop pop pop pop pop! Keep popping!

achievements.name: Milk-face
achievements.description: A cat with an unquenchable thirst for milk. It is likely that he became fat from all the milk.

achievements.name: Maxwell
achievements.description: Beep boop. The focusmaxxing never stops!

achievements.name: Luna
achievements.description: Crunch crunch! Take a break, let's eat raw uranium together!

achievements.name: Nyan Cat
achievements.description: Nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan nyan

achievements.name: Borger
achievements.description: You've worked immensely hard. Here, have a cheeseburger!

achievements.name: Car on Car
achievements.description: Vroooooooooom...hop on, we heading to town!

achievements.name: Cat-caller
achievements.description: Good morning sir, how can I help you? Ah yes, do try turning it off and on. Hopefully that works.

achievements.name: Mrs. Eeper
achievements.description: An eepy lady, often seen eeping in front of the feeders. Sometimes, she eeps in a loaf position. Please don't disturb her!

achievements.name: Mr. Croissant
achievements.description: A cute cat that resembles a croissant. Lives at Happy Canteen.

achievements.name: Goobert
achievements.description: Goobert is a bit of a goober, he's very silly, but he's also brave as he took down Mt. Kibble once. Goobert is a very special boy. Treat him with kindness.

achievements.name: Mr. Fresh
achievements.description: Mr. Fresh only wants fresh kibbles and snacks. He'll wait for as long as it takes, until he gets it.

achievements.name: Stinkwalker
achievements.description: The stinkwalker is the manifestation of decay and despair. Even miles away, his presence can be acutely felt.

achievements.name: War Cat
achievements.description: War Cat has seen much...but he's still shocked by how far you have come. Good job!
